ForienQuestLog.SampleTask: e.g. Kill all rats in „The Twisted Ankle” inn
ForienQuestLog.NoDocument: An entity could not be loaded for UUID: {uuid}
ForienQuestLog.NoPermission: You do not have sufficient permissions to view this entity sheet.

QuestForm.Title: Add new Quest
QuestForm.QuestGiverNamePlaceholder: Please provide a name for custom Quest Source:
QuestForm.DragDropActor: Drag & Drop Actor, Item or Journal Entry or left click to set a custom source.

QuestPreview.Title: Quest Details - {name}
QuestPreview.SubTitle: Subquest of {0}
QuestPreview.DragDropActor: Drag & Drop Actor, Item or Journal Entry to set quest source.
QuestPreview.DragDropRewards: Drag & drop items here to add them as rewards.
QuestPreview.InvalidQuestId: Cannot open Quest Preview due to invalid Quest ID.

DeleteDialog.HeaderDel:
Are you sure you want to delete:

'{name}'
DeleteDialog.BodyQuest: This quest and its data will be permanently deleted.
DeleteDialog.BodyReward: This reward and its data will be permanently deleted.
DeleteDialog.BodyObjective: This objective and its data will be permanently deleted.

CloseDialog.Title: Leave Form
CloseDialog.Body: Are you sure you want to close the form? Unsaved data will be lost.

Notifications.CannotOpen: Cannot open Quest Details. You may lack permissions, Quest might not exist anymore, or provided ID was invalid.
Notifications.UserCantOpen: User {user} doesn't have permission to open this quest.
Notifications.LinkCopied: Entity Link for this quest has been copied to clipboard.
Notifications.QuestMoved: Moved quest to new folder and gave it new status: {target}.

allowPlayersDrag.Enable: Allow Players to drag Rewards to their Inventory
allowPlayersDrag.EnableHint: Check to allow Players to drag Rewards from a Quest Details window to their owned Actors.

availableQuests.EnableHint: Check to show the "Available" tab in the Quest Log Menu where players can see all non-inactive Quests before they are accepted.

countHidden.EnableHint: If checked, the number of completed/total tasks will include hidden tasks.

dynamicBookmarkBackground.EnableHint: If checked, the bookmark tab background is dynamically set to the window content background.

navStyle.EnableHint: Decide how Quest Log's navigation should be displayed.

notifyRewardDrop.EnableHint: Check to see UI notifications when quest rewards are dropped onto player sheets.

showFolder.EnableHint: Check to show quest data folder in Journal tab. For DEBUG purposes only.

showTasks.EnableHint: Decide if or how to show the amount of Objectives next to the Quest Title in Quest Log. This has no effect on the Quest Preview.

defaultPermissionLevel.EnableHint: Sets the default permission level when new quests are created.

hideFQLFromPlayers.EnableHint: When enabled this option hides the Quest Log from all players. Only GM level users will be able to access the Quest Log.

playersWelcomeScreen.EnableHint: Uncheck to prevent players from seeing Welcome Screen on log in after an update. They might still see it by clicking 'help' icon in Quest Log.

allowPlayersAccept.EnableHint: Check to allow players to accept Quests from Available tab.

allowPlayersCreate.EnableHint: Check to allow players to create Quests. Player created Quests will appear in Available tab with Player Edit permissions. REQUIRES 'create journal' core permission.

Tooltips.PersonalQuestButNoPlayers: This is a Personal Quest, but no Players are assigned
Tooltips.PersonalQuestVisibleFor: This is a Personal Quest for
Tooltips.RewardHidden: Reward is hidden. Click to show.
Tooltips.RewardVisible: Reward is visible. Click to hide.
Tooltips.TaskHidden: Objective is hidden. Click to show.
Tooltips.TaskVisible: Objective is visible. Click to hide.

Migration.CouldNotMigrate: Forien's Quest Log - Could not migrate quest: '{name}'
Migration.Start: Forien's Quest Log - Migrating data, please do not reload.
Migration.Schema: Forien's Quest Log - Migrating data to schema version '{version}'
Migration.Complete: Forien's Quest Log - Migrating data complete.

Api.__COMMENT__: No need for translating lines starting with 'API ERROR', they show in console for developers only.

create.title: API Error: Title property is required to create new Quest.

error.noQuest: API Error: Can't create macro with invalid Quest ID.

create.data: API Error: Data property with at least {name, img} is required to create new Reward.
create.type: API Error: Type property is required to create new Reward.

create.name: API Error: Name property is required to create new Objective.

enableQuestTracker.name: Enable Quest Tracker
enableQuestTracker.hint: Check this to enable Quest Tracker HUD window.

questTrackerBackground.name: Quest Tracker Background
questTrackerBackground.hint: Check this to enable background for Quest Tracker, which might help with visibility on certain maps.

questTrackerTasks.name: Show Quest Tracker Tasks
questTrackerTasks.hint: Check this to enable the display of tasks in the Quest Tracker.

resetQuestTracker.name: Reset Quest Tracker Position
resetQuestTracker.hint: Check this to reset position of Quest Tracker to default. Use this if you moved Quest Tracker into position where you cannot move it anymore.
